original_text: You seem to be like a helpless person. You are like a brave fighter who has lost his strength to save anyone. But surely you are among us, Lord. We belong to you as your own people. Do not leave us alone!’ You seem to be like a helpless person.
korean_text: 어찌하여 놀란 자 같으시며 구원하지 못하는 용사 같으시니이까 여호와여 주는 그래도 우리 가운데 계시고 우리는 주의 이름으로 일컬음을 받는 자이오니 우리를 버리지 마옵소서

sentences.original_text: You seem to be like a helpless person
You are like a brave fighter
who has lost his strength to save anyone
But surely you are among us, Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주님은 분명 우리 가운데 계십니다

sentences.original_text: We belong to you as your own people
You seem to be like a helpless person
